title: So many trollers in ranked
body: There are too many people in ranked trolling the game by intentionally feeding, the picks they make and afking. There needs to be an incentive to actual deal with troll players more.

replies.body: Its preseason. People aren't going to try or care as much as normal. Have to deal with it until January when season 9 starts.

I agree with that guy I have accepted that till the end of next season it isnt worth going any farther. Around this time a lot of people are just trolling and grinding to a pacific rank it literally impossible.  Plus a lot of the games i have been in theres always someone that afks comes back and runs down mid. Its not worth the grind as much. But prob do it at your own leisure
Trolling is done by trolls. What is a troller?
